name: Kist Tomato Sauce Sachet Combo Pack
description: The bright red luscious tomatoes used give this sauce its natural red colour and fresh pure taste of tomatoes. It has no added flavours or colours. Compliments fried savouries, french fries, fried rice, Pasta dishes and is a perfect ingredient to use in preparation of various dishes.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
